verses.verse: In that day <WH3117> shall this song <WH7892> be sung <WH7891> <WH8714> in the land <WH776> of Y'hudah <WH3063>; We have a strong <WH5797> city <WH5892>; salvation <WH3444> will 'Elohim appoint <WH7896> <WH8799> for walls <WH2346> and bulwarks <WH2426>.
Open <WH6605> <WH8798> ye the gates <WH8179>, that the righteous <WH6662> nation <WH1471> which keepeth <WH8104> <WH8802> the truth <WH529> may enter in <WH935> <WH8799>.
Thou wilt keep <WH5341> <WH8799> him in perfect <WH7965> peace <WH7965>, whose mind <WH3336> is stayed <WH5564> <WH8803> on thee: because he trusteth <WH982> <WH8803> in thee.
Trust <WH982> <WH8798> ye in the YY <WH3068> for ever <WH5703>: for in the YY <WH3050> JEHOVAH <WH3068> is everlasting <WH5769> strength <WH6697>:

For he bringeth down <WH7817> <WH8689> them that dwell <WH3427> <WH8802> on high <WH4791>; the lofty <WH7682> <WH8737> city <WH7151>, he layeth it low <WH8213> <WH8686>; he layeth it low <WH8213> <WH8686>, even to the ground <WH776>; he bringeth <WH5060> <WH8686> it even to the dust <WH6083>.
The foot <WH7272> shall tread it down <WH7429> <WH8799>, even the feet <WH7272> of the poor <WH6041>, and the steps <WH6471> of the needy <WH1800>.
The way <WH734> of the just <WH6662> is uprightness <WH4339>: thou, most upright <WH3477>, dost weigh <WH6424> <WH8762> the path <WH4570> of the just <WH6662>.

Yea, in the way <WH734> of thy judgments <WH4941>, O YY <WH3068>, have we waited <WH6960> <WH8765> for thee; the desire <WH8378> of our soul <WH5315> is to thy name <WH8034>, and to the remembrance <WH2143> of thee.

With my soul <WH5315> have I desired <WH183> <WH8765> thee in the night <WH3915>; yea, with my spirit <WH7307> within <WH7130> me will I seek thee early <WH7836> <WH8762>: for when thy judgments <WH4941> are in the earth <WH776>, the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of the world <WH8398> will learn <WH3925> <WH8804> righteousness <WH6664>.

Let favour be shewed <WH2603> <WH8717> to the wicked <WH7563>, yet will he not <WH1077> learn <WH3925> <WH8804> righteousness <WH6664>: in the land <WH776> of uprightness <WH5229> will he deal unjustly <WH5765> <WH8762>, and will not <WH1077> behold <WH7200> <WH8799> the majesty <WH1348> of the YY <WH3068>.

YY <WH3068>, when thy hand <WH3027> is lifted up <WH7311> <WH8804>, they will not see <WH2372> <WH8799>: but they shall see <WH2372> <WH8799>, and be ashamed <WH954> <WH8799> for their envy <WH7068> at the people <WH5971>; yea, the fire <WH784> of thine enemies <WH6862> shall devour <WH398> <WH8799> them.
YY <WH3068>, thou wilt ordain <WH8239> <WH8799> peace <WH7965> for us: for thou also hast wrought <WH6466> <WH8804> all our works <WH4639> in us.
O YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430>, other lords <WH113> beside <WH2108> thee have had dominion <WH1166> <WH8804> over us: but by thee only will we make mention <WH2142> <WH8686> of thy name <WH8034>.

They are dead <WH4191> <WH8801>, they shall not live <WH2421> <WH8799>; they are deceased <WH7496>, they shall not rise <WH6965> <WH8799>: therefore hast thou visited <WH6485> <WH8804> and destroyed <WH8045> <WH8686> them, and made all their memory <WH2143> to perish <WH6> <WH8762>.

Thou hast increased <WH3254> <WH8804> the nation <WH1471>, O YY <WH3068>, thou hast increased <WH3254> <WH8804> the nation <WH1471>: thou art glorified <WH3513> <WH8738>: thou hadst removed it far <WH7368> <WH8765> unto all the ends <WH7099> of the earth <WH776>.
YY <WH3068>, in trouble <WH6862> have they visited <WH6485> <WH8804> thee, they poured out <WH6694> <WH8804> a prayer <WH3908> when thy chastening <WH4148> was upon them.

Like <WH3644> as a woman with child <WH2030>, that draweth near <WH7126> <WH8686> the time of her delivery <WH3205> <WH8800>, is in pain <WH2342> <WH8799>, and crieth out <WH2199> <WH8799> in her pangs <WH2256>; so have we been in thy sight <WH6440>, O YY <WH3068>.

We have been with child <WH2029> <WH8804>, we have been in pain <WH2342> <WH8804>, we have as it were <WH3644> brought forth <WH3205> <WH8804> wind <WH7307>; we have not wrought <WH6213> <WH8799> any deliverance <WH3444> in the earth <WH776>; neither <WH1077> have the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of the world <WH8398> fallen <WH5307> <WH8799>.

Thy dead <WH4191> <WH8801> men shall live <WH2421> <WH8799>, together with my dead body <WH5038> shall they arise <WH6965> <WH8799>. Awake <WH6974> <WH8685> and sing <WH7442> <WH8761>, ye that dwell <WH7931> <WH8802> in dust <WH6083>: for thy dew <WH2919> is as the dew <WH2919> of herbs <WH219>, and the earth <WH776> shall cast out <WH5307> <WH8686> the dead <WH7496>.

Come <WH3212> <WH8798>, my people <WH5971>, enter <WH935> <WH8798> thou into thy chambers <WH2315>, and shut <WH5462> <WH8798> thy doors <WH1817> about thee: hide <WH2247> <WH8798> thyself as it were for a little <WH4592> moment <WH7281>, until the indignation <WH2195> be overpast <WH5674> <WH8799>.

For, behold, the YY <WH3068> cometh out <WH3318> <WH8802> of his place <WH4725> to punish <WH6485> <WH8800> the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of the earth <WH776> for their iniquity <WH5771>: the earth <WH776> also shall disclose <WH1540> <WH8765> her blood <WH1818>, and shall no more cover <WH3680> <WH8762> her slain <WH2026> <WH8803>.
